content: AB-P Backing pads for fiber discs Angle grinder backing pads for use with fiber discs of various grain sizes ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to help you get the desired finish more easily when working with angle grinders and fiber discs Multiple hardness options available, so you can choose the ideal balance of rigidity and flexibility for the job Applications For use with fiber discs Modifying fiber disc performance depending on the combination of backing pad hardness, grain size and diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Arbor size: 7/8 in Thread diameter: 5/8-11 Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Technical Data | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2243197 - Backing pad AB-P 5 medium - Package Size 1 pc - 2243183 - Backing pad AB-P 7 hard - Package Size 1 pc
